songs.lyrics:
Yeah…
Mr Rai…
It’s your boy…

Akhiyan’ch soorma tu paya kar na
Baal to colour karaaya kar na
Load ni tainu kisi mascare di
Bullan utte lippie laya kar na

Ik gal tu dass de mainu
Makeup kaahton kardi aein
Rab ne jehda husn ditta
Ohnu cover kyun karke rakhdi ae

Ik gal tu dass de mainu
Makeup kahton kardi ae
Mainu taan ohda hi…

Tu lagge mainu perfect
Baby ban gayi tu saddi girl
Tu lagge mainu perfect
Tere wargi nobody girl

Tu lagge mainu perfect
Baby ban gayi tu saddi girl
Tu lagge mainu perfect
Tere wargi nobody girl

[BADSHAH RAP]
Perfect jaise Kohli ki timing
Perfect jaise flow mera, flow mera
Teri har ek cheez hai perfection
Mind karti hai blow mera
Har outfit teri hit
Teri alag hawat
Tujhe nahi parwah girl
Jaadu kala teri yeh jawani
Na kisi se de ye kuch karwa girl
Kar le tu love, na kar tu ladaiyan
Ladkon ki tere pichhe chhooti hai padhaiyan
BP ho jaaye low jab cute sa face
Bana ke leti tu angdaaiyan
Jo bhi tujhe chahiye le le go grab it
De de mujhe dil apna let me have it
Yeh to tujhko bhi hai pataa
Loonga tujhko pata main kyun
Habit!

(You know it…)
Badshah…

Tenu lod ni kudiye
Mehngiyan mehngiyan dress’an di
Teri simplycity ne patlon kehar machaya hai
Kyon sheeshe muhre behke time gawauni ae
Jad Rab ne khulla time tere te laaya ae

Koi kami labhdi nahi
Tu jachdi ae saari ni
Kal ki karaan rab ton daraan
Lakk patla patta ton bhaari ni

Koi kami labhdi nahi
Tu jachdi ae saari ni
Kal ki karaan rab ton daraan
Lakk patla…

Tu lagge mainu perfect
Baby ban gayi tu saddi girl
Tu lagge mainu perfect
Tere wargi nobody girl

Tu lagge mainu perfect
Baby ban gayi tu saddi girl
Tu lagge mainu perfect
Tere wargi nobody girl

Tu lagge mainu perfect
Baby ban gayi tu saddi girl
Tu lagge mainu perfect
Tere wargi nobody girl


Tu lagge mainu perfect

songs.title: Perfect
